description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=3/3. An action-packed platformer where you play as a janitor defeating weird out of control beasts. Fight your way through the facility armed with your trusty mop - while searching for secret health bonuses. Upgrade with the amazing laser bucket and take on the evil ghost boss at the end!
